commands.name: activity
commands.description: Change bot activity.

commands.name: ascii
commands.description: Convert text into ASCII.

commands.name: emoji
commands.description: Get the full size version of an emote.
examples: `e :stuck_out_tongue:`

commands.name: emojidelete
commands.description: Delete an emoji.
examples: `emojidel :some_emoji:` - Will delete "some_emoji" from the server

commands.name: emojiupload
commands.description: Upload an emoji to the server
examples: `addemoji thonk` (+ attached image) - Will upload the attached image as an emoji called "thonk"

commands.name: help
commands.description: Get more information about the available commands or a specific command.
examples: `help` - Get help about all the commands.
`help [command]` - Get help about a certain command.

commands.name: imageresize
commands.description: Proportionally resize an image based on a new width (px). Works best with pixel art. For anything else, it will be pixelated, but not too noticeably.
examples: `upscale 700` - proportionally resize an image, new width is 700 pixels

commands.name: lmgtfy
commands.description: Generate a "Let Me Google That For You" link.

commands.name: movies
commands.description: Get a list of the movies that are airing today on the Romanian/Hungarian TV.

commands.name: remoteecho
commands.description: Echo something to a server from a different server.

commands.name: serverinfo
commands.description: Get some information about the current server.

commands.name: serverstatus
commands.description: Checks whether all of my websites are up and running.

commands.name: upscale
commands.description: Upscale an image by a certain amount. Works best with pixel art. For anything else, it will be pixelated, but not too noticeably.
examples: `upscale 3` - upscale an image 3 times its original size

commands.name: uptime
commands.description: Get the bot's uptime.

commands.name: version
commands.description: Get ThimbleBot's version.

commands.name: 8ball
commands.description: Ask the 8-Ball any question.

commands.name: anagram
commands.description: Get the anagrams of a word or expression.
examples: `anagram Curly Brace` - Will display the anagrams of "Curly Brace".

commands.name: avatar
commands.description: Get the avatar of a certain user.
examples: `avatar @someone#1234` - Get someone's avatar based on their DiscordTag
`avatar someone` - Get someone's avatar based on their username/nickname
`avatar` - Get your own avatar

commands.name: beemovie
commands.description: Get a random sentence from the Bee Movie script.

commands.name: beemovie
commands.description: Get a random sentence from the Bee Movie script.

commands.name: doge
commands.description: Dogeifies a given string.

commands.name: hyphen
commands.description: Place the hyphen one word to the right in every [adjective]-ass [noun] sequence. https://xkcd.com/37/

commands.name: minesweeper
commands.description: Play Minesweeper using Discord spoiler tags.
examples: `minesweeper 8 8 20` - Generate an 8x8 Minesweeper field with 20 mines
`minesweeper 8 8 20 1` - Generate the code for an 8x8 Minesweeper field with 20 mines

commands.name: bird
commands.description: Get a random picture, GIF, or video of a bird.

commands.name: randombunny
commands.description: Get a random GIF of a bunny.

commands.name: cat
commands.description: Get a random picture, GIF, or video of a cat.

commands.name: dog
commands.description: Get a random picture, GIF, or video of a dog.

commands.name: randompony
commands.description: Get a random pony picture or GIF. Uses the Derpibooru search syntax: https://derpibooru.org/search/syntax

commands.name: reverse
commands.description: Get the reverse of a given string.
examples: `reverse Thimble` - will return "elbmihT"

commands.name: stalinsort
commands.description: Sort numbers using the O(n) Stalin Sort algorithm. Numbers must be separated by space.
examples: `stalinsort 7 6 2 1 9 2 4`

commands.name: user
commands.description: Get some basic information about the specified user.
examples: `user @someone#1234` - Retrieve the information based on a DiscordTag
`user someone` - Retrieve the information based on a username/nickname
`user` - Retrieve information about your own account

commands.name: ban
commands.description: Ban a member.
examples: `ban @someone#1234` - Ban a user
`ban @someone#1234 reason` - Ban a user with a reason

commands.name: kick
commands.description: Kick a member.
examples: `kick @someone#1234` - Kick someone
`kick @someone#1234 reason` - Kick someone with a reason

commands.name: purge
commands.description: Purge the last `n` (2-100) messages.
examples: `purge 20` - Will purge up to the last 20 messages

commands.name: purgefrom
commands.description: Purge all messages starting from a given message ID.
examples: `purgefrom 123456`

meta.name: Boop
meta.description: The boop command and the commands related to it.

commands.name: boop
commands.description: Boop someone or yourself.
examples: `boop @someone#1234` - Boop someone based on their DiscordTag
`boop someone` - Boop someone based on their username/nickname
`boop` - Ask the bot to boop you

commands.name: boopcount
commands.description: Check your or someone else's current boop count.
examples: `boopcount @someone#1234` - Get someone's boop count based on their DiscordTag)
`boopcount someone` - Get someone's boop count based on their username/nickname
`boopcount` - Get your own boop count

commands.name: boopleaderboard
commands.description: Get the boop leaderboard for the current server.

commands.name: toggleboop
commands.description: Allow or disable getting booped.
